name: OFFICE OF DISCIPLINARY COUNSEL, Petitioner, v. Marie Elena KLARMAN, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Office of Disciplinary Counsel v. Klarman

parties: OFFICE OF DISCIPLINARY COUNSEL, Petitioner, v. Marie Elena KLARMAN, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 15th day of May, 2006, upon consideration of the Recommendation of the Three-Member Panel of the Disciplinary Board dated April 4, 2006, the Joint Petition in Support of Discipline on Consent is hereby granted pursuant to Rule 215(g), Pa.R.D.E., and it is
ORDERED that Marie Elena Klarman is suspended on consent from the Bar of this Commonwealth for á period of one year and one day retroactive to January 16, 2006, and she shall comply with all the provisions of Rule 217, Pa.R.D.E.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
901 A.2d 471
OFFICE OF DISCIPLINARY COUNSEL, Petitioner, v. Marie Elena KLARMAN, Respondent.
No. 1063 Disciplinary Docket No. 3.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
May 15, 2006.
